JGAL

Class GAL_NaturalSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_NaturalSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GAL_RankingSelector, GAL_RouletteSelector, GAL_TournamentSelector

    public abstract class GAL_NaturalSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_NaturalSelector is an abstract class for the selection operator.

    Subclasses of GAL_NaturalSelector must provide methods for selectNewPopulation.

    • Method Detail

      • selectNewPopulation

        public abstract GAL_Population selectNewPopulation(GAL_Population origin,
                                 GAL_ChromosomeConfig config)
                                            throws NotValidOperation
        Selects the new population to be used in the next generation.
        Parameters:
        origin - The population thats going to be used for the selection.
        Returns:
        A new population created from the origin population.
        Throws:
        NotValidOperation - If an operation can't be done with the given parameters.
